p: The world has already learned the importance of working collaboratively to overcome two global outbreaks, which stemmed from the SARS outbreak of 2002 and the MERS outbreak of 2012. After the SARS outbreak in 2003, it took researchers about 20 months to develop a vaccine for human trials. In 2015, researchers were able to prepare a vaccine for the Zika virus in just six months [ 5].
